body.name: sharanix Laptop Screen Extender,14'' Dual Screen Laptop Monitor Extender,FHD 1080P IPS Portable Monitor for 13''to17'' Laptop,USB/Type-C/HDMI Ports Plug-Play,Compatible with Win/Mac/Android/Switch
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 14 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 14 mins
features: 【Dual screen display, efficient operation】 :The sharanix portable monitor is suitable for laptop screen extenders, allowing you to open multiple windows simultaneously without the need to switch back and forth continuously on a single laptop screen, improving your efficiency by up to 200%. Very suitable for conference presentations and multitasking. Perfect for gamers, programmers, finance and investment professionals, designers, and anyone who needs more efficient workflows.

【1080P High Dynamic Rendered Image Quality】: 14 "Full HD External laptop monitor extender dual screen with 1920x1080 resolution, rich colors, better viewing experience, and independent adjustment of brightness, contrast, backlight and other parameters, providing you with a bright, clear, and immersive viewing experience, always protecting your eyes and minimizing fatigue.

【 Plug and play without driver 】: The portable laptop screen extender comes with each required cable (1 * Type-C cable, 1 * USB-C to USB-A cable, 1 * HDMI cable). Simply connect it to your laptop via USB Type-C/HDMI to start using it. No additional driver downloads are required. If the screen shows "no signal" after connecting the USB-C cable, it means that the C port of your laptop only supports power supply, so you need to connect the HDMI cable to the laptop monitor extender to provide video

【 Wide application range 】: This laptop portable screen is equipped with an expansion bracket on the back for easy use. The bracket is clamped on the top of the computer screen, making it easy to install and secure without falling off. The connected monitor of a laptop can also rotate 180 degrees, allowing multiple people to share the same laptop screen content simultaneously. The horizontal and vertical screens can be freely switched.

【 High compatibility and preferred gift 】: The display extension of portable monitors for laptops supports a wide range of devices and operating systems, including Intel, AMD, ARM, Android, Windows, Mac, M1, M2, Chrome, Linux, Type-C phones, PS4, Xbox, Switch, M1 Pro/Max, M2 Pro/Max, and other processors. A stylish screen extender is definitely an ideal gift for friends, colleagues, and wives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: Very simple and fast setup, and excellent resolution. Loved how quick and easy it was to double my laptop’s screen space. The magnetic case and the cables that were included were perfect, too! Would highly recommend this!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for a 2nd monitor for when I worked from home. I worked hybrid from time to time & this has made my office away from the office a lot more productive.

reviews.reviewText: Easy to connect and can be used for the perfect size of the laptop screen. The belt will be better, but the bag bracket is very suitable for carrying it with you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Boosted Productivity On-The-Go
reviews.reviewText: Crisp Display: The 15-inch screen with 1920 x 1080p resolution delivers a bright and crisp display, making it easy to view spreadsheets and multiple websites simultaneously without sacrificing clarity.Color Accuracy: The excellent color accuracy is a standout feature, particularly beneficial for graphics and marketing tasks, ensuring a reliable representation of visuals.Plug-and-Play Ease: The straightforward setup with a plug-and-play feature simplifies the process, allowing compatibility with both Windows PC and Mac laptops, making it versatile for different users.Lightweight and Portable: The lightweight design is perfect for travelers, and the easy attachment to my 15-inch laptop adds minimal bulk while providing the dual-screen functionality.Enhanced Multitasking: The dual-screen setup significantly boosts productivity, allowing for efficient multitasking and eliminating the need for constant toggling between applications.Conclusion:In summary, the Portable Dual Screen Laptop Workstation has proven to be an invaluable investment for remote workers and frequent travelers. Its impressive display quality, ease of setup, and compatibility make it a top choice for those seeking a portable multi-monitor solution. The enhanced productivity and convenience it offers make it a must-have for professionals on the move.Recommendation:I highly recommend this portable dual-screen workstation to anyone in need of a reliable, on-the-go multi-monitor solution. Whether you're a remote worker or a frequent traveler, the benefits in terms of productivity and flexibility make it well worth the investment.
